text: Annie Mac (born 18 July 1978) is an Irish presenter and DJ. Until 2021 she hosted an eponymous electronic dance music show. It was on BBC Radio 1. Features of her program included a 5-minute "mini mix". That was where a guest DJ submits a short remix. That featured many songs in a short time period, and the "12 inches of 12"s" competition where people can win a cubic foot of vinyl records. ==Other websites== *BBC Radio 1: Annie Mac Category:1978 births Category:DJs Category:Musicians from Dublin Category:Living people
title: Annie Mac
